channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AirDoctor Coupon Codes: 40% Off | December 2025
item.description: Save up to $400 on top air purifiers and filters with verified AirDoctor promo codes and special offers for December 2025.

item.title: Laptops Have Never Been Cheaper. That Trend Might Reverse in 2026
item.description: Despite all the worries about the economy, laptop prices have never been lower. But in 2026, all of that could change.

item.title: Runware raises $50M Series A to help make image, video generation easier for developers
item.description: Runware lets developers integrate realtime image generation in their apps, with an affordable pricing model.

item.title: How the Next Big Thing in Carbon Removal Sunk Without a Trace
item.description: With support from Microsoft, Stripe, and Shopify, Running Tide billed itself as on the cutting edge of carbon removal. In the end, it resorted to dump...

item.title: 20% Off LG Promo Code & Coupons | December 2025
item.description: Save 20% with an LG promo code today, plus up to $1,000 off appliances, 40% off bestselling TVs and monitors, and more early Black Friday bundle offer...

item.title: OnePlus Promo Code: $70 Off | December 2025
item.description: Save 30% with a OnePlus coupon this month, plus save up to 10% on earbuds, phones, and more.

item.title: Harness hits $5.5B valuation with $240M raise to automate AI’s ‘after-code’ gap
item.description: Goldman Sachs has led Harness's Series E round, with participation from IVP, Menlo Ventures, and Unusual Ventures.

item.title: Port raises $100M at $800M valuation to take on Spotify’s Backstage
item.description: Port offers a proprietary alternative to Spotify's popular devtool catalog Backstage, but with a valuable addition: it can be used to manage AI agents...

item.title: Google’s answer to the AI arms race — promote the guy behind its data center tech
item.description: Amin Vahdat has been promoted to chief technologist for AI infrastructure, a newly created position reporting directly to CEO Sundar Pichai.

item.title: Baby delivered in Waymo continues proud tradition of not making it to the hospital
item.description: Some traditions, it seems, are immune to disruption.
